New Records: Coby White nearly achieved a triple-double with 23 points, 10 rebounds, and nine assists
Key Match Events: The game went into overtime after Miles Bridges missed a corner 3 with 2 seconds left to send it to extra period
Patrick Williams knocked down a corner 3 off an assist from Lonzo Ball with 49 seconds left in overtime to push the Chicago lead to seven
The Bulls raced to an eight-point lead in overtime
Pre-Game Insights: LaMelo Ball missed the game due to wrist soreness
Brandon Miller sat out with a sprained ankle
Zach LaVine and Ayo Dosunmu were out for Chicago due to toe soreness and soleus strain respectively
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tre Mann will miss at least another two weeks with disc irritation
LaMelo Ball has now missed 116 of Charlotte's last 196 games over the past three seasons
